\setmainfont[
  Path = ./common/env/fonts/dueblo/mod/,
  Extension = .otf,
  UprightFont = *-MED,
  BoldFont = *-BOL,
  ItalicFont = *-REG,
  BoldItalicFont = *-REG,
  Ligatures = {NoCommon, NoDiscretionary},
  Numbers=Lining,
]{Dueblo-SEMI-EXT}

\newfontfamily{\liturgy}[
  Path = ./common/env/fonts/liturgy/,
  Extension = .ttf,
  UprightFont = *-Regular,
]{Liturgy}

%\setlength{\emergencystretch}{6em}
\EverySelectfont{%

\fontdimen3\font=2em% interword stretch
\fontdimen4\font=0.15em% interword shrink
%\fontdimen7\font=0.1em% extra space
}

% Commands %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%

\newcommand{\symbolCross}{{\liturgy +}}
\newcommand{\symbolDagger}{‚Ä†}
\newcommand{\symbolResponse}{{\liturgy R}}
\newcommand{\symbolVersicle}{{\liturgy V}}
\newcommand{\symbolPoint}{ùÑ™}
\newcommand{\symbolBreak}{~{\itshape *}~~}
\newcommand{\symbolBreakFinal}{~{\itshape **}~~}

\newcommand{\romanNumeralCaps}[1]{\MakeUppercase{\romannumeral #1}}

\newcommand{\firstLetter}[1]{{\fmtFirstLetter #1}}

\newcommand{\antiphonDayOfWeek}[7]{
  \prayerTitleAndSubtitle{#1}{#2}\vspaceSmall

  \prayerVersicleResponse{#3}{#4}

  \prayerVersicleResponse{#5}{#4}
  
  \prayerVersicleResponse{#6}{#7}
}

\newcommand{\antiphonSundayVespers}[9]{
  \prayerTitleAndSubtitle{#1}{#2}\vspaceSmall

  \prayerVersicleResponse{#3}{#4}

  \prayerVersicleResponse{#5}{#4}
  
  \prayerVersicleResponse{#6}{#4}
  
  \prayerVersicleResponse{#7}{#4}
  
  \prayerVersicleResponse{#8}{#9}
}

\newcommand{\prayerText}[1]{%
  \textsc{#1}
}

\newcommand{\prayerTitleAndSubtitle}[2]{%
  \hspace{3em}
  {\fmtPrayerTitle\textsc{#1}}
  \hspace{2em}
  {\fmtPrayerSubtitle\textsc{#2}}
}

\newcommand{\prayerVersicle}[1]{%
  {\small\symbolVersicle.}\phantom{-}\textsc{#1}
}

\newcommand{\prayerResponse}[1]{%
  {\small\symbolResponse.}\phantom{-}\textsc{#1}
}

\newcommand{\prayerVersicleResponse}[2]{%
  \prayerVersicle{#1}

  \prayerResponse{#2}
}

\newcommand{\prayerVersicleResponseSmallSpace}[2]{%
  \prayerVersicle{#1}\vspaceSmall

  \prayerResponse{#2}
}

\newcommand{\subSubTitle}[1]{%
  \hspace{3em}
  \subTitleNote{#1}
}

\newcommand{\subTitle}[1]{%
  \hspace{3em}
  {\fmtBoldWideText\textsc{#1}}
}

\newcommand{\subTitleNote}[1]{%
  {\fmtItalicWideText\textsc{#1}}
}
